about_the_game:
In Megachickens, each turn you summon a chicken card onto a tile on the field. These summoned chickens deal damage to adjacent enemy chickens. Line up three or more in a row, and you’ll unleash a direct attack on your opponent! 

Tactical Deckbuilding Meets Board Battles. 

In MegaChickens, we fused a deckbuilder roguelike with a board game mechanics based on strategical aligning pieces on the field. It’s a single-player experience where the key to victory lies in choosing the right cards and positioning them strategically on the board. 

Success isn’t just about which cards you choose to add on your deck; it’s about when, where, and how you play them.

Defeat the 12 Zodiac Bosses

Traverse the map, collecting top chicken cards, powerful artifacts, totems, coins, and berries to prepare for tougher challenges and the ultimate showdown against the Zodiac bosses. Face off against 12 cosmic bosses, each inspired by a zodiac sign.

Collect, evolve and unlock rare chickens!

With 300+ unique cards, you’ll hatch and evolve each chicken from Egg to Chick to mighty Megachicken, maximizing stats and abilities along the way. Each chicken comes in Fire, Water, or Grass types, and clever combinations of types will let you unlock powerful strategies for every encounter.

4 Henfluencers to Choose From

Start with one brave character, and unlock up to four distinct playable Henfluencers, each bringing their own unique deck of chicken cards and play style. Master all the decks: Lord of the Wings, Eggpocalypse Now, Cluck Fiction, and Henfinity War.

That’s a roguelike, so each run the encounter on the map are procedural generated. No two playthroughs are the same.

Experience & Upgrades

Earn golden feathers with each run to unlock new cards in the Upgrade Shop. Fail, adapt, and grow stronger. Keep going, gather Likes with your Henfluencer, and you’ll unlock their legendary card, a game-changer that can completely alter your strategy.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
